title: shrI nAtha sOdarIm
sahitya:
shrI nAtha sOdarIm tiraskariNIm namAmi


anupallavi

  pAnapAtra dhAriNIm paradEvatArAdhinIm


caraNam    dIna dEva rakSiNIm divyarada sancAriNIm
dhana dAnya pradAyinIm drDha sEnAdi bhanjanIm
		(madhyamakAla)
unnata vAgvilAsinIm UrdhaVmnAya tOSiNIm
gAnAmrtA nandinIm guruguhanuta nabhOmaNIm
